name: Imelda Marcos
office1: Member of the  Philippine House of Representatives  from Ilocos Norte's 2nd District
office2: Member of the  Philippine House of Representatives  from Leyte's 1st District
office3: Member of Parliament  for Region IV (Metro Manila)
predecessor3: ''Office created'', as members of the National Assembly: Leon G. Guinto, Alfonso E. Mendoza
successor3: as Mambabatas Pambansa for Manila: Eva Estrada-Kalaw, Carlos Fernando, Mel Lopez, Gonzalo Puyat II, and Arturo Tolentino
children: Imee Marcos Ferdinand "Bongbong" Marcos Jr. Irene Marcos Aimee Marcos (adopted)
